thutcore.config.not_finished: Unfinished, please use the ingame commands, or edit the config files directly.
thutcore.config.explosionRadius.tooltip: Maximum radius of effect of explosions, lower this to reduce RAM use of blasts.
thutcore.config.explosionRate.tooltip: Rate at which explosions are calculated, Lower values result in explosions taking longer, but less lag.
thutcore.config.affectAir.tooltip: are air blocks affected by blasts, if this is false, mobs in air might not take damage.
thutcore.config.minBlastEffect.tooltip: Explosions will terminate once their strength drops below this.
thutcore.config.resetAllTerrain.tooltip: If true, will not load subbbiomes from nbt, thereby resetting them.
thutcore.config.customBiomeMappings.tool: Custom block definitions for subbiomes, format is <subbiome>-><blockinfo>, Example: crystalcave->quark:crystal would result in areas with quark crystal blocks being crystalcave subbiomes.
thutcore.config.threadCount.tooltip: Number of AI threads to make at startup, custom mob AI is distrobuted to these threads.
thutcore.config.whitelist.tooltip: Tile Entity ids which are confirmed to work with block entities.
